sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Remove apm_user from business_planner</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_role_contains");
gr.addQuery("contains", "7722dd809320220028517a75e57ffb9d"); //sn_apm.apm_role
gr.addQuery("sys_id", "b9ec01a03b403300a70fe79c83efc4b4");
gr.query();
//fix script to remove sn_apm.apm_user role from business_planner role, which is been deleted in Quebec release
if(gr.next()) {
	gs.info("Deleting sn_apm.apm_user role from business_role contained roles");
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	var deletedRole = gr.deleteRecord();
	if(deletedRole)
		gs.info("Deleted sn_apm.apm_user role from business_role contained roles");
	else
		gs.info("Failed to remove sn_apm.apm_user role from business_role contained roles");
	gr.setWorkflow(true);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-24 03:34:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d7c2c3f051e11110f877a679568f6382</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove apm_user from business_planner</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Portfolio Management Core" source="com.snc.apm_core">2e7b3c243c35311068bcf327dfe37fb1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d7c2c3f051e11110f877a679568f6382</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-24 03:43:15</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
